title: Automation Epic
body:
Onboarding
- [x] https://github.com/status-im/status-desktop/issues/6435 (note: needs confirmation)
- [x] [Can login with correct password](https://github.com/status-im/status-desktop/pull/6540/files#diff-6f9bf2b681e8b71c5483051a02e8d1d881097a0654b16f469ccf7dedc27765b8R207) (note: needs confirmation)
- [x] [Can relogin after restart](https://github.com/status-im/status-desktop/pull/6540/files#diff-6f9bf2b681e8b71c5483051a02e8d1d881097a0654b16f469ccf7dedc27765b8R207) (note: needs confirmation)
- [x] [Import 12, 18 and 24 seed phrases](https://github.com/status-im/status-desktop/pull/6399) (note: needs confirmation)
  - [x] a seed phrase that fails the checksum should results in an error
- [ ] [After login the status should be online](https://github.com/status-im/status-desktop/issues/6854)

Chat
- [x] [Join a public channel and send a message](https://github.com/status-im/status-desktop/pull/6540) (note: needs confirmation)

Wallet
- https://github.com/status-im/status-desktop/issues/6507
  - [x] #6754
  - [x] [Generate new account](https://github.com/status-im/status-desktop/pull/6502)
  - [ ] Can generate an account with a custom derivation path
- Account management
  - [x] #6761
  - [x] #6817
  - [x] #6819
  - [x] #6898
  - [x] #6896
  - Saved Addresses
    - [x] [Can add an address to Saved addresses](https://github.com/status-im/status-desktop/issues/6761)
    - [x] #6899
    - [x] #6818
    - [x] Can bookmark a saved address
- Transactions
  - [x] [Basic send transaction](https://github.com/status-im/status-desktop/pull/6581)
  - [ ] #6899
- [ ] [Wallet](https://github.com/status-im/status-desktop/issues/7528)
  - User adds a watch only account
  - User generates a new account from wallet
  - User imports a private key
  - User imports a seed phrase
  - User deletes a generated account
  - Can see collectibles for an account
  - User can edit the default wallet account
  - User can toggle network and see balances

General

Activity Center
- [ ] Can see replies and mentions in activity center
- [ ] Can jump to a message from the activity center
- [ ] Can mark an activity center notification as read

CI integration
- [x] https://github.com/status-im/status-desktop/issues/5960
